subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and services, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from using Diversdesk?
faqs.answer: Diversdesk is ideal for dive centers of all sizes, from small local operators to larger international dive schools. It’s also beneficial for diving instructors, dive shops, and tour operators looking to manage bookings, staff schedules, and customer interactions more efficiently.

faqs.question: What makes Diversdesk different from other dive center management tools?
faqs.answer: Not only do we offer the most comprehensive planner in the industry "according to our users", but Diversdesk also stands out with its intuitive, user-friendly interface, extensive feature set, and integrated payment solutions. Built in collaboration with dive centers in the most dynamic, tourism-driven diving locations, Diversdesk ensures it meets the specific needs of the diving industry worldwide.

faqs.question: How does the free trial work?
faqs.answer: Our free trial gives you full access to Diversdesk’s features for a limited period. After the trial, you can choose a plan that best fits your needs and convert to a paid plan, unless you decide to end our journey together. No strings attached. Rest assured, we'll notify you when the end of your trial is approaching

faqs.question: How does the payment processing work?
faqs.answer: Diversdesk integrates with Xendit for seamless payment processing. Payments made through Xendit are automatically updated as paid in the system. You can also manually enter other payment methods if needed.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription by providing a 30-day notice. The cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

faqs.question: Is my data secure on Diversdesk?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We prioritize the security and privacy of your data. Our platform complies with the relevant regulations and standards to ensure your information is protected.

faqs.question: What if I need additional support or training?
faqs.answer: At Diversdesk, we take customer support to the next level. We offer various support options, including a documentation hub, video training, and personal on-demand video support on the go. Reach out anytime if a question or uncertainty arises, and we'll swiftly assist you.

faqs.question: Can I customize the software to fit my dive center’s specific needs?
faqs.answer: Yes, Diversdesk is flexible and customizable to fit the unique needs of your dive center. You can customize activities, staff schedules, and more to suit your operations.

faqs.question: How do I manage staff access and permissions?
faqs.answer: Diversdesk allows you to set different rights and permissions for staff members, ensuring they have access only to the areas of the platform relevant to their roles.
